Homestead.Homestead Base, Florida:
Homestead Base is a census-designated place (CDP) in Miami-Dade County, Florida, United States. The population was 446 at the 2000 census.


== Geography ==
Homestead Base is located at 25°29′24″N 80°23′34″W.
According to the United States Census Bureau, the CDP has a total area of 4.3 square miles (11 km2), all of it land.
